detectors.description: HLTCLogic.burnLogic(address,uint256,string,string,bytes32,address,uint256) (HLTCLogic.sol#50-69) calls keccak256(abi.encodePacked()) with multiple dynamic arguments. It could result in hash collisions:require(bool,string)(taskHash == keccak256(bytes)((abi.encodePacked(from,value,ltcAddress,proof))),taskHash is wrong) (HLTCLogic.sol#57)
